name: Panda Quest - Find Differences
description:
Panda Quest is a fun and engaging game where you have to spot the five differences between the two very similar pictures. Play against the clock in single player, or put your observation skills to test against other players online in two-player mode!

Panda Quest - Find Differences features:

- Exciting gameplay with hundreds of levels
- Hidden bonus games
- Single mode and online Player vs Player
- Beautiful images and challenging tasks

Are you quick and sharp enough to find all five differences before the time runs out or before your opponent uncovers them? Download the game and find out!
